title: General Sample Description - stages defined here apply to all description instances
description: Definitions for elements that appear in different stages of a wizard targeted: 'ref', id of stage; 'title',  header used for the stage; items, actual form elements on the page; 'is_singular_stage', if all items must have same value for this stage

properties.title: Number of Samples
properties.message: Enter the number of samples you want to describe. You can describe multiple samples having a common set of attributes.

items.help_tip: Enter number of samples to be described
items.label: Number of Samples

properties.title: Sample Clone
properties.message: Sample cloning is a way of bootstrapping sample description, and can help speed up the description process. If you choose to clone a sample, you will, at a later stage, be able to select an existing sample to clone. Alternatively, you can clone from a remote service by providing a sample accession.

items.help_tip: Please specify if you want to clone a sample
items.label: Do you want to clone a sample?

option_values.label: Yes
option_values.description: Select this option if you want to clone an existing sample.

option_values.label: No
option_values.description: Select this option if you do not want to clone a sample.

properties.title: Sample Type
properties.message: Please specify how you want to describe your samples. Sample Type provides suitable metadata specifications or configurations that form the basis of your description.

properties.title: Cloning Method
properties.message: You can either select an existing sample record from your work profile to clone, or enter a sample accession to be resolved from a remote service.

items.help_tip: Select an existing sample to clone
items.label: Sample

items.help_tip: Enter sample accession to resolve, then click the Resolve! button
items.label: Accession

items.help_tip: Please specify and commit to a sample cloning method
items.label: Specify a cloning method

option_values.label: Existing Sample
option_values.description:
Select this option if you want to clone an existing sample in your work profile. You will be required to select a target sample from the list of available samples presented.
Please note that this option is disabled when there are no samples in your profile.

option_values.label: Resolve Accession
option_values.description:
Select this option if you want to clone a sample from a remote service. You will be required to supply a valid and publicly available accession to be resolved.
Please note that this process currently only supports resolving accessions to the BioSamples database.

properties.title: Proposed Sample Name
properties.message:
If you have predefined sample names, you can copy and paste them as tab or comma delimited string values in the Predefined Names box. Alternatively, you can supply a ‘bundle name’, in the Bundle Name box, that will form the base part from which individual sample names may be derived.
Please note that sample names, both generated and predefined, will be validated in the next stage for uniqueness.

items.help_tip: Enter your predefined sample names as tab or comma delimited string values in the provided text box (e.g., SMPXY_1EU,SMPXY_2EU,SMPXY_3BF).
items.label: Predefined Names

items.help_tip: Enter a bundle name. Generated names from this entry will be of the form: SMPXY_1, SMPXY_2, etc., where the 'SMPXY' part of a generated name is the entry you provide here.
items.label: Bundle Name

items.help_tip: Please specify and commit to a sample naming method
items.label: Select a naming method

option_values.label: Predefined Names
option_values.description:
Select this option if you have predefined sample names elsewhere that you would like to use to label your samples.
You will have to supply the sample names as tab or comma delimited string values.

option_values.label: Bundle Name
option_values.description:
Select this option if you want to supply a ‘bundle name’.
A bundle name forms the base part from which individual sample names will be derived.

properties.title: Assigned Sample Name
properties.message: Do you want to modify the generated sample names to better reflect individual samples in your bundle?
